text: Diocese of Syrmia (also Srem, or Srijem) may refer to: * Serbian Orthodox Diocese of Syrmia, an Eastern Orthodox diocese of the Serbian Orthodox Church in Serbia * Roman Catholic Diocese of Syrmia, one of dioceses of Roman Catholic Church in Serbia ==See also== * Syrmia * Bishopric of Syrmia (disambiguation) * Eastern Orthodoxy in Serbia * Catholic Church in Serbia
title: Diocese of Syrmia
